column2: Migrated from EPA STORET Legacy Database- originally reported by Wisconsin DNR
It was a clear sunny day on Adams Lake- the lake level was normal and I saw a very big trout!
Partly cloudy- light breeze- upper 70s. One small boat fishing.
Partly cloudy- light breeze. 74*F air temp. One shore fisherman near boat landing. No other boats on the water.
Beautiful- calm day on the lake. No other boats on the water.
Battery died in the temperature meter so a temp profile was not able to be collected this time.
Slight breeze. Lake smelled strongly like cow manure. Overcast conditions during sampling.
No boats on the water. Calm wind. Overcast at time of Secchi reading.
